analytic.title: Observations on Some Biblical Citations in Ephrem’s Commentary on Genesis

biblStruct.note: The biblical citations recorded by Ephrem in section VI of his Commentary on Genesis (Gen. 5.32–9.16) support the Peshitta textual stream represented by MS 5b1 = 8/5b1 as over against that represented by MS 7a1. Ephrem’s approach of weaving the biblical text into the fabric of his retelling of the story of Genesis affects the evaluation of potential variant readings. Stylistic improvement, compression, abbreviation, and lexical substitution for the purpose of drawing together large stretches of text characterize his biblical citations.
